member.summary: The constructor to instantiate a compiler with a file-based configuration

member.name: M:FSCL.Compiler.Compiler.#ctor(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{FSCL.Compiler.IKernelModule,FSCL.Compiler.KernelCacheEntry})
member.summary: The default constructor of the compiler
member.returns: An instance of the compiler with the default configuration
member.remarks: Defalt configuration means that the FSCL.Compiler configuration folder is checked for the presence of a configuration file. If no configuration file is found, the Plugins subfolder is scanned looking for the components of the compiler to load. In addition of the 0 or more components found, the native components are always loaded (if no configuration file is found in the first step)

member.summary: The FSCL compiler

member.name: P:FSCL.Compiler.Configuration.SourceConfiguration.IsExplicit
member.summary: Whether this source is explicit or not
member.remarks: An explicit source is a source where all the components in the assembly/file and all the related information are explicitated. In an implicit source the set of steps, processors and type handlers are instead to be found and parsed through reflection, investigating the types declared in the assembly and their eventual step, processor or type handler attributes.
